nav_fontsize.label: NavBar Text Fontsize
nav_fontsize.comment: Set NavBar Text Font Size. default = 21px

general_fontfamily.label:
General

fntuc-gen use class for set this font.

font_family.label: Font Family
font_family.comment: Set General Font Family. if set default = Roboto

google_fontfamily.label: Google Font Family
google_fontfamily.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

googleprimary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
googleprimary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

general_fontsize.label: Fontsize
general_fontsize.comment: Set Theme Text Font Size. default = 13px

heading_fontfamily.label:
Heading (Title, Shopping Cart etc.)

fntuc-head use class for set this font.

head_font_family.label: Font Family
head_font_family.comment: Set Heading Font Family. if set default = Fjalla One

head_google_fontfamily.label: Google Font Family
head_google_fontfamily.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

head_googleprimary_char_latin_ext.label: Character Set: Latin Extended
head_googleprimary_char_latin_ext.comment: Only selected fonts support extended character sets. For a complete list of available fonts and font subsets please refer to Google Web Fonts.

heading_imported_font.label:
Default Imported Fonts (Title, Shopping Cart etc.)

Use below list type of fonts class for display own style.

  • fntuc-style1 > class for display "FjallaOneRegular" font.
  • fntuc-style2 > class for display "BebasNeueRegular" font.
  • fntuc-style3 > class for display "LatoBold" font.
  • fntuc-style4 > class for display "BebasNeueBold" font.

boxed_bgimg.label: Boxed Background Image
boxed_bgimg.comment: Set out of box background image for boxed version.

boxed_bgcolor.label: Boxed Background Color
boxed_bgcolor.comment: Set out of box background color for boxed version.

product_btn_style.label: Products Buttons Style
product_btn_style.comment: Set product display button style. default = Style1 (Medium Size)(default)

compare_link.label: Show Compare Dropdown
compare_link.comment: Set yes to display Compare link in top bar.

sticky_nav.label: Show Sticky Menu
sticky_nav.comment: Set yes to display Sticky Navigation Menu.

catprod_altimg_enable.label: Alternative Image
catprod_altimg_enable.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product.

catprod_aspratio.label: Product Image Aspect Ratio
catprod_aspratio.comment: Set auto height for product image.

catprodimg_width.label: Image Width
catprodimg_width.comment: Set image width (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image width is 276)

catprodimg_height.label: Image Height
catprodimg_height.comment: Set image height (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image height is 342)

product_aspratio.label: Product Image Aspect Ratio
product_aspratio.comment: Set auto height for product image.

product_image_width.label: Image Width
product_image_width.comment: Set image width (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image width is 336)

product_image_height.label: Image Height
product_image_height.comment: Set image height (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image height is 417)

elevate_lenssize.label: lensSize
elevate_lenssize.comment: used when zoomType set to lens, when zoom type is set to window, then the lens size is auto calculated. Default: 200

elevate_bordersize.label: borderSize
elevate_bordersize.comment: Border Size of the ZoomBox - Must be set here as border taken into account for plugin calculations. Default: 4px

elevate_tint.label: Tint
elevate_tint.comment: Enable a tint overlay, other Default: false

elevate_tint_color.label: tintColour
elevate_tint_color.comment: set Colour of the tint. Default: 333

elevate_tint_opacity.label: tintOpacity
elevate_tint_opacity.comment: set opacity of the tint. Default: 0.4

elevate_scrollzoom.label: scrollZoom
elevate_scrollzoom.comment: Set Yes to activate zoom on mouse scroll.Default: No

elevate_easing.label: easing
elevate_easing.comment: Set Yes to activate easing. Default: Yes

elevate_cursor.label: cursor
elevate_cursor.comment: set cursor for zoom. Default: default

elevate_lightbox.label: Lightbox Enable
elevate_lightbox.comment: On Product Image Click to open lightbox. Default: Yes

product_tab_style.label: Tab Style
product_tab_style.comment: set product tabs style. Default: Verticle

prodslider_altimg_enable.label: Alternative Image
prodslider_altimg_enable.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product.

prodslider_aspratio.label: Product Image Aspect Ratio
prodslider_aspratio.comment: Set auto height for product image.

prodsliderimg_width.label: Image Width
prodsliderimg_width.comment: Set image width (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image width is 276)

prodsliderimg_height.label: Image Height
prodsliderimg_height.comment: Set image height (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image height is 342)

prodmslider_altimg_enable.label: Alternative Image
prodmslider_altimg_enable.comment: Show alternative image on mouse hover over the product.

prodmslider_aspratio.label: Product Image Aspect Ratio
prodmslider_aspratio.comment: Set auto height for product image.

prodmsliderimg_width.label: Image Width
prodmsliderimg_width.comment: Set image width (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image width is 100)

prodmsliderimg_height.label: Image Height
prodmsliderimg_height.comment: Set image height (ex: product image size 870x1080, you can set image height is 124)

relatedprod_max.label: Max Products
relatedprod_max.comment: set number of products want to display in related products.

relatedprod_1c_item.label: 1 Column item
relatedprod_1c_item.comment: set number of products for display related products in 1 Column. Default: Verticle

relatedprod_2c_item.label: 2 Columns item
relatedprod_2c_item.comment: set number of products for display related products in 2 Columns. Default: Verticle

relatedprod_3c_item.label: 3 Columns item
relatedprod_3c_item.comment: set number of products for display related products in 3 Columns. Default: Verticle

upsellprod_max.label: Max Products
upsellprod_max.comment: set number of products want to display in upsell products.

upsellprod_1c_item.label: 1 Column item
upsellprod_1c_item.comment: set number of products for display upsell products in 1 Column. Default: Verticle

upsellprod_2c_item.label: 2 Columns item
upsellprod_2c_item.comment: set number of products for display upsell products in 2 Columns. Default: Verticle

upsellprod_3c_item.label: 3 Columns item
upsellprod_3c_item.comment: set number of products for display upsell products in 3 Columns. Default: Verticle

custom_gmap.label: Google Map Block
custom_gmap.comment: In order to display Google Map Block, use the Static Block ID (CMS->Static Blocks section) e.g. contacts_google_map

custom_store_info.label: Store Information Block
custom_store_info.comment: In order to display Store Information Block, use the Static Block ID (CMS->Static Blocks section) e.g. contacts_store_information

overwrite_blocks.label: Overwrite Existing Blocks
overwrite_blocks.comment: If the identifiers of the static blocks are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import Static Blocks" button.

import_blocks.label: Static Blocks
import_blocks.comment: Click this button to create all static blocks provided with this theme.

overwrite_pages.label: Overwrite Existing Pages
overwrite_pages.comment: If the identifiers of the cms pages are already exist, you can set to "Yes" then save the configuration, then click the "Import CMS Pages" button.

import_pages.label: CMS Pages
import_pages.comment: Click this button to create all CMS Pages provided with this theme.
